'''TruMoo''' is a brand of milk. In 2025, they collaborated with {{AMCM}} to sell milk with ''Minecraft'' themed packaging. The products included a half-gallon{{More information needed|Are these imperial gallons or US gallons?}} of chocolate milk featuring an {{AMCM|enderman}}, a full gallon featuring a {{AMCM|zombie}}, and a limited edition vanilla flavored half-gallon that was colored green and themed around a {{AMCM|creeper}}.
